original_text:
King of Seven
King of Seven può essere definita una slot dal tono classico, un richiamo alla tradizione grazie a un mix di simboli che annovera campanelle, ciliegie, ferri di cavallo e quadrifogli.
Come al solito, il provider TPG ha disegnato simboli di grandi dimensioni con colori brillanti e una definizione che rende King of Seven un piacere anche per gli occhi. La griglia di gioco ha uno sfondo nero, con la cornice dorata che divide i rulli in 15 riquadri. La consolle è sistemata nella parte sottostante della schermata, qui potrete trovare i tasti che permettono di variare la puntata e lo Start. Sulla sinistra ci sono i pulsanti per disattivare la musica di sottofondo e gli effetti sonori. Dalla parte destra si accede invece alla tabella dei pagamenti.
Scommesse contenute ma vincite sbalorditive
Le scommesse minime sono molto contenute, 0,1 € per ognuna delle 25 linee di pagamento fisse che si snodano su una griglia 5×3.
King of Seven ha un gameplay molto interessante: in caso di combinazione pagante, i simboli rimangono fissi sui rulli per i giri successivi e cambiano solo quelli perdenti. In questo modo, si possono ottenere stringhe di simboli più lunghe e quindi maggiormente remunerative, oppure ottenere combinazioni del tutto nuove. Le somme verranno pagate solo in seguito all’ultimo Spin senza combo paganti.
Un’altra funzione classica è quella per i giri automatici, se ne possono selezionare da 10 a 999 e c’è pure un tasto che permette di accelerare la rotazione dei rulli.
Tanti simboli portafortuna
In King of Seven abbiamo simboli poco remunerativi e simboli dalla rendita molto alta, oltre a due speciali.
Al primo gruppo appartengono le carte da gioco dal J all’asso. Anche se sono i simboli che pagano meno, con una combo di 5 si ottiene una vincita pari a 4 – 10 volte la scommessa iniziale.
Fanno parte del gruppo dei simboli dall’alta rendita, il ferro di cavallo, le ciliegie, il quadrifoglio, la campanella e il numero 7. Le vincite vanno da 12,5 volte la scommessa del ferro di cavallo alle 100 volte del numero 7.
Veniamo ora ai simboli speciali. Il diamante è il nostro Wild, che ricopre la classica funzione di Jolly e andrà a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter.
Lo Scatter è rappresentato dalla stella argentata e dà avvio al gioco bonus:

Con 5 Scatter otterremo 10 Free Spins
Con 6 Scatter otterremo 15 Free Spins
Con 7 Scatter otterremo 20 Free Spins
Con 8 Scatter otterremo 25 Free Spins
Dai 9 a 15 Scatter otterremo 30 Free Spins

Durante il gioco bonus a tutte le vincite verrà applicato un moltiplicatore x3. Non c’è un limite alle volte in cui i giri gratis possono essere riattivati.

raw_translation.response:
The King of Seven slot game exudes a touch of classicism, with its medley of symbols including bells, cherries, horseshoes, and four-leaf clovers. TPG, the provider of the game, has designed the symbols with bright colors and larger-than-life graphics, that will surely delight even the most discerning gamblers. The gaming grid is set against a black background, with a golden frame dividing the reels into 15 compartments. The console is found at the bottom of the screen, providing options to adjust your bets and initiate the game. On the left-hand side are buttons to turn off the background music and sound effects while the payout table is located on the right side. 

The game offers minimal stakes yet astonishing payouts. You can play with a minimum stake of 0.1 € for each of the 25 fixed pay lines that span across a 5x3 grid. The King of Seven offers an intriguing gameplay where winning symbols will remain fixed on the reels for your next spin, while only the losing symbols will change. This makes it possible to land longer and more lucrative symbol strings or even generate entirely new winning combinations. Payouts are awarded only after the last spin with no winning combinations. Another classic function is the autoplay feature, where you can choose to have your spins from 10 to 999, including a button to speed up the spinning process.

The game boasts both low and high payout symbols, including two special ones. The low payout symbols are the playing cards from Jack to Ace, with a payout ranging from 4-10 times your initial bet with a combination of five symbols. On the other hand, the high payout symbols consist of the horseshoe, cherry, four-leaf clover, bell, and the number 7, with payouts from 12.5 times your bet for the horseshoe up to 100 times your bet for the number 7. The Wild symbol, the diamond, will substitute for all the other symbols except the Scatter symbol, represented by the silver star. Landing five to 15 scatter symbols will trigger the game's bonus round, offering 10 to 30 free spins with a 3x multiplier for all wins. The free spins can be reactivated multiple times, providing endless chances of winning big. 

Overall, King of Seven is a must-try classic-themed slot game that delivers enticing payouts and impressive graphics. Make sure to give it a spin and see for yourself what this game has in store for you.

message.content:
The King of Seven slot game exudes a touch of classicism, with its medley of symbols including bells, cherries, horseshoes, and four-leaf clovers. TPG, the provider of the game, has designed the symbols with bright colors and larger-than-life graphics, that will surely delight even the most discerning gamblers. The gaming grid is set against a black background, with a golden frame dividing the reels into 15 compartments. The console is found at the bottom of the screen, providing options to adjust your bets and initiate the game. On the left-hand side are buttons to turn off the background music and sound effects while the payout table is located on the right side. 

The game offers minimal stakes yet astonishing payouts. You can play with a minimum stake of 0.1 € for each of the 25 fixed pay lines that span across a 5x3 grid. The King of Seven offers an intriguing gameplay where winning symbols will remain fixed on the reels for your next spin, while only the losing symbols will change. This makes it possible to land longer and more lucrative symbol strings or even generate entirely new winning combinations. Payouts are awarded only after the last spin with no winning combinations. Another classic function is the autoplay feature, where you can choose to have your spins from 10 to 999, including a button to speed up the spinning process.

The game boasts both low and high payout symbols, including two special ones. The low payout symbols are the playing cards from Jack to Ace, with a payout ranging from 4-10 times your initial bet with a combination of five symbols. On the other hand, the high payout symbols consist of the horseshoe, cherry, four-leaf clover, bell, and the number 7, with payouts from 12.5 times your bet for the horseshoe up to 100 times your bet for the number 7. The Wild symbol, the diamond, will substitute for all the other symbols except the Scatter symbol, represented by the silver star. Landing five to 15 scatter symbols will trigger the game's bonus round, offering 10 to 30 free spins with a 3x multiplier for all wins. The free spins can be reactivated multiple times, providing endless chances of winning big. 

Overall, King of Seven is a must-try classic-themed slot game that delivers enticing payouts and impressive graphics. Make sure to give it a spin and see for yourself what this game has in store for you.

raw_translation.response:
King of Seven 
King of Seven can be defined as a classic-themed slot machine, evoking tradition through a mix of symbols including bells, cherries, horseshoes, and four-leaf clovers. As is typical of TPG, the provider behind the game, the symbols are large in size, with bright colors and a sharp definition that makes King of Seven pleasing to the eye. The game grid has a black background, with a golden frame dividing the reels into 15 squares. The control panel is located at the bottom of the screen, where you can find buttons to adjust your bet and start the game. On the left, there are buttons to turn off the background music and sound effects, while on the right, you can access the paytable.
 
Though the minimum bets are modest at 0.1 €, King of Seven offers staggering winnings. The game's gameplay is highly intriguing: in cases of a winning combination, the symbols remain fixed on the reels for subsequent spins, with only the losing symbols replaced. This allows for longer and more lucrative strings of symbols, or even entirely new combinations. Winnings are only paid out after the final non-paying spin. Another classic feature is the automatic spin button, which allows you to choose between 10 and 999 spins and even speed up the reel rotation.
 
King of Seven includes symbols with varying payouts, with the group of less rewarding symbols featuring playing cards from Jack to Ace. Although they have lower payouts, a combination of five can still payout between 4 to 10 times the initial bet. The high-paying symbols group, on the other hand, includes the horseshoe, cherries, clover, bell, and the number 7, with winnings ranging between 12.5 times the bet for the horseshoe and 100 times for the 7.
 
The game also features two special symbols: the diamond is the wild and acts as the joker, while the silver star functions as the scatter. A combination of five scatter symbols grants 10 free spins, while six offers 15, seven rewards 20, eight provides 25, and from nine to 15 scatters, you'll receive 30 free spins, with a 3x multiplier applied to all winnings during the bonus round. There are no limits to how many times free spins can be reactivated.

Review: The King of Seven slot game exudes a touch of classicism, with its medley of symbols including bells, cherries, horseshoes, and four-leaf clovers. TPG, the provider of the game, has designed the symbols with bright colors and larger-than-life graphics, that will surely delight even the most discerning gamblers. The gaming grid is set against a black background, with a golden frame dividing the reels into 15 compartments. The console is found at the bottom of the screen, providing options to adjust your bets and initiate the game. On the left-hand side are buttons to turn off the background music and sound effects while the payout table is located on the right side. 

The game offers minimal stakes yet astonishing payouts. You can play with a minimum stake of 0.1 € for each of the 25 fixed pay lines that span across a 5x3 grid. The King of Seven offers an intriguing gameplay where winning symbols will remain fixed on the reels for your next spin, while only the losing symbols will change. This makes it possible to land longer and more lucrative symbol strings or even generate entirely new winning combinations. Payouts are awarded only after the last spin with no winning combinations. Another classic function is the autoplay feature, where you can choose to have your spins from 10 to 999, including a button to speed up the spinning process.

The game boasts both low and high payout symbols, including two special ones. The low payout symbols are the playing cards from Jack to Ace, with a payout ranging from 4-10 times your initial bet with a combination of five symbols. On the other hand, the high payout symbols consist of the horseshoe, cherry, four-leaf clover, bell, and the number 7, with payouts from 12.5 times your bet for the horseshoe up to 100 times your bet for the number 7. The Wild symbol, the diamond, will substitute for all the other symbols except the Scatter symbol, represented by the silver star. Landing five to 15 scatter symbols will trigger the game's bonus round, offering 10 to 30 free spins with a 3x multiplier for all wins. The free spins can be reactivated multiple times, providing endless chances of winning big. 

Overall, King of Seven is a must-try classic-themed slot game that delivers enticing payouts and impressive graphics. Make sure to give it a spin and see for yourself what this game has in store for you.

Review: The King of Seven slot game exudes a touch of classicism, with its medley of symbols including bells, cherries, horseshoes, and four-leaf clovers. TPG, the provider of the game, has designed the symbols with bright colors and larger-than-life graphics, that will surely delight even the most discerning gamblers. The gaming grid is set against a black background, with a golden frame dividing the reels into 15 compartments. The console is found at the bottom of the screen, providing options to adjust your bets and initiate the game. On the left-hand side are buttons to turn off the background music and sound effects while the payout table is located on the right side. 

The game offers minimal stakes yet astonishing payouts. You can play with a minimum stake of 0.1 € for each of the 25 fixed pay lines that span across a 5x3 grid. The King of Seven offers an intriguing gameplay where winning symbols will remain fixed on the reels for your next spin, while only the losing symbols will change. This makes it possible to land longer and more lucrative symbol strings or even generate entirely new winning combinations. Payouts are awarded only after the last spin with no winning combinations. Another classic function is the autoplay feature, where you can choose to have your spins from 10 to 999, including a button to speed up the spinning process.

The game boasts both low and high payout symbols, including two special ones. The low payout symbols are the playing cards from Jack to Ace, with a payout ranging from 4-10 times your initial bet with a combination of five symbols. On the other hand, the high payout symbols consist of the horseshoe, cherry, four-leaf clover, bell, and the number 7, with payouts from 12.5 times your bet for the horseshoe up to 100 times your bet for the number 7. The Wild symbol, the diamond, will substitute for all the other symbols except the Scatter symbol, represented by the silver star. Landing five to 15 scatter symbols will trigger the game's bonus round, offering 10 to 30 free spins with a 3x multiplier for all wins. The free spins can be reactivated multiple times, providing endless chances of winning big. 

Overall, King of Seven is a must-try classic-themed slot game that delivers enticing payouts and impressive graphics. Make sure to give it a spin and see for yourself what this game has in store for you.
